ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'In Review'), $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", RecordTypeId = $Label.DS_QuoteEditRecordTypeId, ISBLANK(Agreement_Lookup__c ), $Profile.Name = "Non-Sales User Profile", NOT(ISBLANK(SWx_Upsell_Proposal__c))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Mandatory Fields can not be Empty.
